summary: Completed comprehensive Fly.io backend migration testing. All version endpoints working correctly, Render references removed.
passed_tests: Version endpoint returns complete version info with 8 features
Version check endpoint validates client compatibility correctly
Version features endpoint returns all expected features
Version deployment endpoint shows fly.io platform and coinbase-love app
fly.toml configuration points to coinbase-love app with correct URLs
All Render references successfully removed from codebase
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: Not tested (backend only)
action_item_for_main_agent: External Fly.io URL (https://coinbase-love.fly.dev) is not responding to requests. This may be due to: 1) App not deployed to Fly.io yet, 2) App sleeping on free tier, or 3) DNS/routing issues. All backend endpoints work correctly locally.
